an10.130:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma bhavita bahulikata ragavinayapariyosana honti dosavinayapariyosana honti mohavinayapariyosana honti, nannatra sugatavinaya.
an10.130:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma bhavita bahulikata ragavinayapariyosana honti dosavinayapariyosana honti mohavinayapariyosana honti, nannatra sugatavinaya”ti.
